channel.title: CVE Feed for TemeGUM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TemeGUM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-44035|2024-10-07T12:27:38.547Z -- temegum -- gum%20elementor%20addon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in TemeGUM Gum Elementor Addon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gum Elementor Addon: from n/a through 1.3.7.
